text: De zavhodno vy, smertʹ spiymaye z vamy, navitʹ yakshcho vy zhyvete u formidable zamkakh. Pry shchosʹ harnoho vidbuvayetʹsya yim, yak kazhutʹ, "Tse vmiye z BOHA, ta pry shchosʹ pohanykh afflicts yim, vony osudzhuyutʹ vas. Skazhitʹ, "Vse prybuvaye z BOHA." Chomu tsi lyudy nevirno rozumiyutʹ mayzhe vse
